In this game, you’ll work at a factory and repair the latest 'wonders of technology.' They break down constantly, so we’ll now give you a quick masterclass on the types of breakdowns you might encounter.

Steam leaks. To patch a pipe, grab the welding tool with 'E,' activate it with 'LMB,' and bring it to the leak.

P.S. To drop an item, press 'Q.'
Fires are just as common, so our factories are equipped with water hoses. Grab a hose, turn it on, and aim the water at the fire.
Some machines require you to periodically release pressure. Hold the button until the pressure drops.
In some mechanisms, a gear may break under stress. Replace it with a new one from the table. You can just toss the old one on the floor or dispose of it in the trash.
Some mechanisms have belts that can slip off their shafts. Grab a new belt from the table, click 'LMB' on one shaft, then on the other.
In some machines, a hose might come loose. Grab its end and insert it into the protruding pipe.
